assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: CL Educate Limited operates as a technology-enabled provider of education products, services, content, and infrastructure in India and internationally. It operates through Consumer Test Prep, Consumer Publishing, Enterprise Corporate, and Enterprise Institutional segments. The company offers coaching for higher education entrance exams, such as MBA, Law, BBA, RBI Grade-B, GRE, and GMAT under the Career Launcher brand; GATE coaching; non-test preparation courses, such as data science, as well as financial upskilling courses, including CFA, FRM, and NISM. It also publishes and sells educational books to related and third parties, such as test preparation guides, books, and other academic materials under the GK Publications brand; offers experiential marketing and event management, digital and marcomm, and manpower management and traing services, as well as customized engagement programs and strategic business solutions under the Kestone Integrated Marketing Services brand; provides integrated solutions, including business advisory and outreach support services to educational institutions and universities under the CL Media brand; and offers student recruitment services, and research and incubation services, as well as operates a career development center. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated a network of approximately 211 physical study centers across 94 cities in India and the Middle East. CL Educate Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in New Delhi, India.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Rachna  Sharma
companyOfficers.title: Associate VP, Company Sec. & Compliance Officer

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Nikhil  Mahajan
companyOfficers.title: Group CEO of Enterprise Bus. & Exec. Director
